post1.title: Success Stories
post1.content: Stories from across the web of happy and content friends . . There are two sides to every story, here - we are cherry-picking just one side Thread/Tweetstorm . I quit my job at the Googleplex in 2015 after 7+ years in the Bay Area and moved to Bangalore with my wife.One big reason was the uncertainty and lack of flexibility on an H1B.The green card wait was 10+ years at that point.1/ https://t.co/skK6JSzRNG . — Muralidharan Venkatasubramanian (@_muralidharan_) June 25, 2020 Tweets . I can attest to this. Left my H1B and green card, came back to work with #Jio over 5 years ago. Couldn‚Äôt be happier. The impact you can have in this country is immense. It‚Äôs time to build, but for a Billion people. Come back Home, #MakeInIndia. . — Mayank Kapoor (@mayankkapoor) June 23, 2020 I moved Valley‚Äî> India due to a personal situation outside my control. It SUCKED to wrap up my startup abruptly. 4Y later: 1) Joined incredible team @LightspeedIndia 2) @reliancejio wave 3) Backed amazing return-founders e.g. @acharyaamrit at @zetwerk. When life gives you lemons! . — Vaibhav Agrawal (@tweetingva) June 23, 2020 I lived/worked in US for 5yrs on H1B. Applied for GC knowing the unpredictabe timelines. But the constraints were too much. Cancelled the process to return to India. No regrets! There is so much more one can do in a growing economy like India üöÄ as a first class citizen. https://t.co/8Pw41N2pyc . — Rishi Kulkarni üòäü§òüôè (@rishikulkarni) June 25, 2020 I moved to India from San Francisco/ the Bay Area 8.5 years ago. If your mindset is positively inclined to India and you are considering a move given this H1B issue, check out these webinars this Saturday. Hear from 10 women and men who moved back! https://t.co/lGXWAyKbAi . — Dev Khare (@dkhare) June 25, 2020

page1.title: About
page1.content: Namaste! . This is a quick brew over a single cup of coffee to help those considering moving back to India make a more informed decision. This is inspired from the work of Hemant Mohapatra @MohapatraHemant . For instance: . #ComeHomeAndBuild Join us for a webinar this Sat (US) on moving from #US2India w/ speakers who‚Äôve been there, done that & continue to build for the world from India. We'll talk family, quality of life, women's safety, work culture, & starting up. Register https://t.co/wY440qGh38 pic.twitter.com/cjHx4l00eP . — Hemant Mohapatra (@MohapatraHemant) June 25, 2020 ‚Ä¶and‚Ä¶ . I spent the last 15yrs in US in enterprise engg/product/venture @AMD, @Google & @a16z before returning to India. I'm often asked how India compares to SV hot-bed of enterprise innovation. Besides US, I feel world-class enterprise startups will come from India & here's why üëá: . — Hemant Mohapatra (@MohapatraHemant) June 28, 2019 This is maintained by the community ‚Äì so please do tweet your finds to @NirantK .

page2.content: . FAQ . How should I decide whether I am ready? . Here is a decision framework written by someone who came back home. . Can I talk to some people who‚Äôve done this last few years? . Of course, here are some people. . Career . What salary can I expect as a software engineer back in India? . levels.fyi maintains the most neutral source of this information . Who maintains this? . By the community, please share your stories by tweeting to NirantK . Latest .
